definitions.definition: One of several rivers in Eastern Europe, including but not limited to:

subdefinitions.definition: Seversky Donets River, which flows through Russia and Ukraine into the Don River.

definitions.definition: A governorate of the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic , named for the River Donets, established in February 1919 and abolished in February 1925.

main_definition: One of several rivers in Eastern Europe, including but not limited to:
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) A governorate of the Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic , named for the River Donets, established in February 1919 and abolished in February 1925.
